definitions.title: n.f. 1.
definitions.body: meadow (?) 1Sa 6:18 MT but rd. [[אֶבֶן]] cf. v:1Sa 6:14; v:1Sa 6:15 LXX SyrVer We Dr.

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city in N. Isr. 2Sa 20:18, near Beth Maacah v:2Sa 20:14 = [[אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה]] v:2Sa 20:15 (so also v:2Sa 20:14 Ew Th We Klo Dr), 1Ki 15:20, 2Ki 15:29; = [[מַיִם]] ´[[א]] 2Ch 16:4 (= Abil el Ḳamḥ, wheat-meadow NW. of Dan & S. of Mutulleh Rob:BR III, 372).

definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: (= acacia-meadow) in lowlands of Moab Nu 33:49; = [[שִׁטִּים]] Nu 25:1, Mic 6:5 (= Tel Kefrein (?) Tristr & Merrill:PESoc. 4th Statement, 89).

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= vineyard-meadow) in Ammon Ju Jdg 11:33 (v. Euseb. )Abelampelwn).

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= dance-meadow) Ju Jdg 7:22, 1Ki 4:12; Elisha's birthplace 1Ki 19:16 (v. Euseb. )Abelmaelai).

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= meadow of Egypt, i.e. fertile as Egypt ?) E. of Jordan Ge 50:11 (where interpr. as if ´[[אֵבֶל מ]], so LXX Vulgate; v. Di).
